comment.author: 50163181@N07
comment._content: I feel the date range for this photo should be 1912 plus or minus 6 years.  No adult would wear a dress like the one in the right of the image in the 1920's.  There is also something about the composition that reminds me of the "Gibson" girl look, which so many advertisers tried to mimic in the early 1900's.  Did this photographer try to follow a similar trend?

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Hello, twofishphoto. Thank you for the correction. You are, in fact, right: our records show that the photograph is dated 25 December 1908. It looks like an error on our part when we uploaded the image. Thanks again.
